document_data.name: Eastside
document_data.mainbody: The '''Eastside''' was a comfortable inn found in the town of [[Termalaine]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was owned and operated by the fisherman [[Clyde (fisherman)|Clyde]] and for a time, his wife.
document_data.Structure: While the inn comprised a single structure, its exterior appeared to be several buildings clustered together.
document_data.Services: The inn offered some of the best accommodations in all of [[Icewind Dale]]. Patrons were tended to by the young girl [[Marta]], who helped Clyde after the passing of his wife.
